name: stalwart
tagline: A modern high performance self-hosted mail server
description: Stalwart Mail Server is a modern self-hosted email platform with IMAP, JMAP, and SMTP support. It focuses on performance, security, and ease of deployment.

features.title: Imap Server
features.description: Provides full-featured IMAP4rev2 support for email clients

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Implements modern JMAP protocol for efficient email sync

features.title: Smtp Server
features.description: Handles incoming and outgoing email with advanced routing

features.title: Spam Filtering
features.description: Blocks spam with built-in filters and external integration

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Searches emails quickly with indexed full-text search

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Handles TLS/SSL for secure email transmission
